name: Potato Dauphinoise
recipeInstructions: Put the thinly sliced potato in a gratin dish in layers, seasoning each layer with salt and pepper.
Put the crushed garlic in the cream.
Pour the cream and garlic mixture over the potatoes.
Top up with milk, so that the liquid is just below the surface of the potatoes.
Cook for between 1 and 1 1/2 hours. Turn the oven up a notch for the last 15 minutes to brown the top.
